name: hydro-vortex--physical
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
